FOOD PLACE

Quinoa Salad

Description: A refreshing salad packed with protein and nutrients, featuring fluffy quinoa, crisp vegetables, and a zesty dressing.

Ingredients: Quinoa, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, bell pepper, lemon vinaigrette.
